name: Colorless (itch)
description:
The bare hands and a mechanical paintbrush, these are the only weapons that you have in order to save your sister. Play as Ink, an emotionless Colorless and show the tyrants of Cromik, that power is not an advantage, but a threat. Infiltrate into Cromik’s giant fortress, defeat each one of the chromatic Kings and obtain new powers while you discover your own feelings.

Attack, run and make use of colors with your mechanical paintbrush if you want to reach your goal. At the moment you enter into the gigantic and menacing fortress, prepare to face hundreds of enemies, numerous puzzles and portals to the different kingdoms and withstand against each one of the five kings. Discover new colors after each boss battle and obtain new incredible powers, while you learn new emotions and begin to feel. Learn the truth behind your sister’s powers and your own existence; and do not forget, without black, no color has any depth.
